personal information is sensitive and needs to be protected. social media platforms have access to our personal details, which can lead to security risks if not properly safeguarded. it's important to understand how our data is being used by these platforms and to take steps to protect it. we need to exercise caution when sharing information online, especially on social media, to avoid exposing ourselves to potential harm.<|endoftext|>
